Posts.Content: its amazing how they can say : no cancer seen after my mascestomy 13 lymph nodes clean, margins clear. 6 years later i have stage 4 breast ca with mets to my bones. lisen to your gut. the drs and insurance companyies make it very difficulty to feel safe. i will keep your message with my prayers. its my only safe place. debra
Posts.Title: Did anyone's cancer NOT show up on Mammogram or Ultrasound?

Posts.Content: in 2003 my lump in my breast did show up in my mammogram, i sorry i was not thinking. with my lump they had trouble with the bx, could not find the lump after my mammogram, which delayed my surgery. currently the cancer is back in my bones, stage 4 breast cancer with mets to bones. which was found when i fell and broke my hip. in treatment on xeloda, and zometa. 2009 cancer back. debra
Posts.Title: Did anyone's cancer NOT show up on Mammogram or Ultrasound?

Posts.Content: On Jun 25, 2012 5:55 AM azdesertRat wrote: Thanks! I'm another with the same story. Stage 3!in 2004 and had be lateral mastectomy, chemo and radiation.....then had 6 or 7 good years thinking I ad beat the demon. My back was giving me lots of pain last summer and I was treated with physio and acupuncture before finally getting the stage 4 dx. I have mets to bones, now lungs and liver. I have been on Xeloda and Pamitrogen since January. I am doing quite well and having scans on Tuesday. I will be nervously waiting the results. I just live each day thanking God for the bonus time I get. I have shrunk 3 inches in the past year or so due to spine involvement. I don't know what or I guess when life has in store so best just to make as good memories as I can for my family and friends. None of us asked for this miserable disease but we have to eat as healthy as possible, drink plenty of water and enjoy life even if it is slightly modified. Take care and prayer for all of you. yes i have breast cancer with mets to bones. take one day at a time. vna comes 2 x week to strenght my muscles and bones. on Zometa monthly. 2 year on xeloda 500 mg 5 tabs 2x day. exeercise as much as i can,. i will fight as along as i can, there no date stamped on my foot. each day is important, god bless everyone fighting, and you will win, because god has plans for all of us. god bless. debbie
Posts.Title: Beating stage IV Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: i repest you so much , i have breast cancer stage 4, and this is my 3 year. you spirit amazees me, as i get depressed and my children are raised . i have 10 grandchildren. i am not sure the genotype of my ca, except estropen + her -. i am on xeloda  2 week cycle on 1 week off. . you give me postive hope and i will continue to beat my cancer . debra
Posts.Title: Beating stage IV Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: is anyone else on this medication. i am 4th stage breast ca with mets to bones. anyone out thee with some knowledge of the drug. how does it stop or slow down the cancer? debra
Posts.Title: xeloda 500 mg tabs 5 in am 5 in pm, is that a usual dose

Posts.Content: On Apr 26, 2012 7:40 AM tafkira wrote: Yes, thanks for posting this, I've just been diagnosed with exactly this. Early breast cancer (DCIS on one side, stage 1 tumor on the other) but already metasticised to my proximal femur, triple positive. I've been all over the Internet looking at survival rates for breast cancer metastisis to the bone and found all the scary alarming info (studies showing mean survival rates of 6 months or 1 year or 2 years, awful), but I also found other studies reporting that life spans for this situation are dramatically increasing with Hepterin and other drugs. Also, it matters a lot how metasticised the cancer is ... how many other sites are involved, and where. May I ask your situation? i have stage 4 ca of breast with mets to all  my bones. i am on xeodla 500mg 10 pills a day 21 days a month. i am starting my 3rd year with this diagnosis. it s  hard but i get up each day and make it count. dont give up to cancer.  so tafkira be postive and figtht the fight. debbie, hollis 40
Posts.Title: stage 4 triple positive breast cancer

Posts.Content: i get one leg swelling , maybe not as bad as yours, but did a ulta sound, no clots, but could not put my shoes on. they were swollen 4-5 months. elevated my leg. no pain just swelling. good luck, god speed. debra
Posts.Title: swelling of the ankles

Posts.Content: i have stage 4 breast cancer, and would have never known, except i fall and broke my hip, i am only 56 at the time, now 2 years later, i am doing ok. with treatment. i have cancer in my cerical,thoracic, lumbar spine, hips, iliac crest. i am unable to work any more. treatment helps keep the bones strong and slows the growth of the cancer cells. i am sorry your mom's diagnosis was found late, but now she can get treatment and hope it is not in any organs. i take one day at a time, your mom is in my prayers. debra
Posts.Title: MY MOTHER NOW HAS STAGE 4 BREAST CANCER
